query.text: Load logged OWL data for the Xsens dataset

query.q: owl_has(EVENT, 'http://knowrob.org/kb/datalabel.owl#objectActedOn', knowrob:'drawer_sinkblock_dishwasher'), owl_individual_of(EVENT, knowrob:'ClosingSomething'), owl_has(EVENT,knowrob:'startTime',T0), owl_has(EVENT,knowrob:'endTime',T1).
query.text: What are the time ranges of DishWasher closing events?
What are the events that acted on dinner plates?

query.q: owl_individual_of(OBJ, knowrob:'DinnerPlate'), owl_has(EVENT, 'http://knowrob.org/kb/datalabel.owl#objectActedOn', OBJ),  owl_individual_of(EVENT, knowrob:'TakingSomething'), owl_has(EVENT,knowrob:'startTime',T0), add_human_pose(T0).
query.text: Show the human pose at the start of dinner plate taking events.

query.q: owl_individual_of(OBJ, knowrob:'DinnerPlate'), owl_has(EVENT, 'http://knowrob.org/kb/datalabel.owl#objectActedOn', OBJ),  owl_individual_of(EVENT, knowrob:'TakingSomething'), owl_has(EVENT,knowrob:'startTime',T0), owl_has(EVENT,knowrob:'endTime',T1), add_trajectory('/RightHand', T0, T1, 0.1).
query.text: Show the trajectory of the right hand for dinner plate taking events.
How was the trajectory of the right hand in given interval?
How was the pose of the human at given timepoint?
